about_the_game:
This game is a puzzle game.
This is a free add-on for customers who purchase the Massive Air Combat.

How to start

You can select this game when you press "Play" in the STEAM application.

Features of the game

The progress of the puzzle game is automatically saved in real time.
Original design characters and poses.
6 puzzles.
There is no time limit so that you can play comfortably.
STEAM Achievements.

Characters and Aircrafts in this puzzle game

XF-98: Fictional fighter in the series.
XF-99: Fictional fighter in the series.
Other fictional fighters in the series.
Sae Hasegawa: Pilot assistant for the XF Joint Strike Fighter.

Controls

Drag a piece of the puzzle with the mouse to complete a picture.This game is a puzzle game.
ESC key or Pause button: PAUSE screen.
Mouse wheel: Zoom in, zoom out.
Drag the left mouse button: move the camera viewpoint.

content_descriptors.notes: The female characters in the puzzle are wearing swimsuits.

name: Massive Air Combat - Puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
